H0.text: Which French prime minister was executed for treason in 1945. Philippe Pétain

H1.text: Which French prime minister was executed for treason in 1945. François Darlan

H2.text: Which French prime minister was executed for treason in 1945. Paul Reynaud

H3.text: Which French prime minister was executed for treason in 1945. Pierre laval

A4.text: Laval was executed by firing squad in October 1945.

A5.text: After the war, Laval was tried as a Nazi collaborator and executed for treason.
